text: Val-de-Livenne is a commune in the Gironde department in Nouvelle-Aquitaine in southwestern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Saint-Caprais-de-Blaye (the seat) and Marcillac.Arrêté préfectoral 1 October 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Gironde department ==References== Category:Communes of Gironde
title: Val-de-Livenne
